LanguageData.AMSC.ToggleSmartTargetDesc: Smart Targeting will automatically attempt to fire at the targets best for the currently loaded shell.
LanguageData.AMSC.ToggleAutoFirefightDesc: Automatically fire at fire if loaded with firefoam shells?
LanguageData.AMSC.SmartShieldTacticsDesc:
Level of smart shield tactics to employ:
None: Vanilla Behavior
EMP Only: Mortars loaded with EMP shells will fire at shields
EMP and Check Target: As above, and also mortars loaded with non-EMP shells will avoid firing at targets that are directly covered by shields.
EMP and Check Full Path: Same as EMP Only, and also mortars with non-EMP shells will check their entire fire arc for shields before firing. WARNING: May cause performance issues. Not Recommended.
